Settings.encparamBox: -f mkv -c:v libx265 -preset medium -tune:v ssim -crf 18.0 -shanakeyframe 10 -libx265main10 -c:a libfdk_aac -b:a 128k -sn -map_metadata -1 -map_chapters 0 -vsync cfr
